style="text-align:left; width:50px;"| Total |- |At least once a month ||20|| 7|| 14|| 59 || 100 |- |A few times a year ||24||17||16|| 43 || 100 |- |Rarely || 26||19||16|| 39|| 100 |- |Never|| 22|| 17||15||46 || 100 |- |Source: ||colspan=5| |} == Referendums == In connection with the 2019 European Parliament elections, two local referendums were held in Sweden. In Svedala municipality, citizens took a stand on whether a prison should be established there, with 67.5% voting no.Klart nej till fängelse i Svedala In the municipalities of Borgholm and Mörbylånga, residents voted on a proposal for a merger to the municipality of Öland, which gave no in both municipalities.Nej till kommunsammanslagning på Öland – folket har sagt sitt ==References== Sweden 2019 Category:2019 elections in Sweden
title: 2019 European Parliament election in Sweden
